item.description: Image: Bethesda Game Studios/Bethesda Softworks Can ‚ÄòStop right there, criminal scum!‚Äô really be improved on? Starfield is a sprawling RPG that promises cosmic awe, mysteries of the universe, and a ...
item.content:encoded: Image: Bethesda Game Studios/Bethesda Softworks Can ‚ÄòStop right there, criminal scum!‚Äô really be improved on? Starfield is a sprawling RPG that promises cosmic awe, mysteries of the universe, and a vast galaxy to explore. Even though its narrative and scope are philosophically profound and very large, respectively, I instead find myself tickled by many of the small details and silly moments in the game. Bethesda RPGs have a certain jankiness to them that persists throughout all their titles, a...

item.content:encoded: Image: Bethesda Game Studios/Bethesda Softworks via thelastfastbender/Reddit You get your own personal rain cloud Starfield players realized this week that their characters have rain clouds that follow them around planets, √† la The Truman Show. Rain isn‚Äôt falling all over Neon, for instance ‚Äî just wherever you roam. A Starfield player posted a screenshot from the game‚Äôs photo mode to Reddit, showing a block of rain around their character, and nowhere else. It may have been surprising for playe...

item.content:encoded: Image: Insomniac Games/Sony Interactive Entertainment Add a free essential PS5 title to your library before Oct. 20 There‚Äôs never been a better time to bring home a PlayStation 5. Right now, people in the U.S. who activate their new PS5 console (either the disc-ready or digital version) before Oct. 20 can get a free game. By the way, that‚Äôs in addition to getting Astro‚Äôs Playroom, a fun platforming game that‚Äôs included with every console. The list below reads like a catalog of the PlayStation ...

item.content:encoded: Image: Square Enix See for yourself how Square Enix rewrites history on Feb. 29 The latest installment of the Final Fantasy 7 remake trilogy launches on Feb. 29, 2024, exclusively for the PlayStation 5. Dubbed Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth, this iteration builds on the first game, which takes place exclusively in Midgar. The sequel promises to be much bigger, taking Cloud Strife and company to plenty of regions filled with minigames, quests, and other challenges ‚Äî some of which were not present in th...

item.content:encoded: Image: Dropout The Bad Kids are back to celebrate D20‚Äôs 5th anniversary Class goes back in session at the Aguefort Adventuring Academy ‚Äî Dimension 20‚Äôs Fantasy High: Junior Year premieres this January. The announcement, made Tuesday on social media, marks the five-year anniversary of the Dungeons & Dragons actual play show‚Äôs launch on Dropout. The announcement also included a CGI trailer, which we‚Äôve embedded below. Lastly: we started this show with Fantasy High and the Bad Kids, and over the ...

item.title: Google Research embarks on effort to map a mouse brain | Google AI Blog
item.description: Posted by Micha≈Ç Januszewski, Research Scientist, Google Research The human brain is perhaps the most computationally complex machine in existence, consisting of networks of billions of cells. R...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Micha≈Ç Januszewski, Research Scientist, Google Research The human brain is perhaps the most computationally complex machine in existence, consisting of networks of billions of cells. Researchers currently don‚Äôt understand the full picture of how glitches in its network machinery contribute to mental illnesses and other diseases, such as dementia. However, the emerging connectomics field, which aims to precisely map the connections between every cell in the brain, could help solve...

item.content:encoded: Image: Larian Studios via Sho ‚ÄòI‚Äôll be there for you when your armor class falls‚Äô The companions of Baldur‚Äôs Gate 3 are one of the high points of the game. Each one of them is a likable, well-realized character, and by the time I got to Baldur‚Äôs Gate proper I was willing to take a bullet for each one. item.content:encoded: Photo: Christina House/Los Angeles Times via Getty Images Negotiations with video game companies begin Sept. 26 On Oct. 21, 2016, video game performers went on strike against 11 video game companies, including Activision, Disney, Electronic Arts, Insomniac Games, Take-Two Interactive, and WB Games. Video game performers who were part of the Screen Actors Guild-American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) stopped working for nearly a year, from October 2016 to November 2017 ‚Äî...

item.content:encoded: Image: Wizards of the Coast Gallifrey and Galadriel are coming to MTG this fall The latest sets to join Magic: The Gathering are currently available to pre-order from Amazon and your local game store. Joining the more conventional Return to Ravnica and The Lost Caverns of Ixalan sets are two new sets themed around The Lord of the Rings and Doctor Who. The Lord of the Rings set that‚Äôs available to pre-order is set to launch on Nov. 3, and represents the second wave of MTG cards centered around ...

item.description: Posted by Cheng-Yu Hsieh, Student Researcher, and Chen-Yu Lee, Research Scientist, Cloud AI Team Large language models (LLMs) have enabled a new data-efficient learning paradigm wherein they can ...
item.content:encoded: Posted by Cheng-Yu Hsieh, Student Researcher, and Chen-Yu Lee, Research Scientist, Cloud AI Team Large language models (LLMs) have enabled a new data-efficient learning paradigm wherein they can be used to solve unseen new tasks via zero-shot or few-shot prompting. However, LLMs are challenging to deploy for real-world applications due to their sheer size. For instance, serving a single 175 billion LLM requires at least 350GB of GPU memory using specialized infrastructure, not to mention th...

item.content:encoded: The release of Language Learning Model (LLM) ChatGPT by OpenAI in November of last year opened the floodgates leading to alternatives including Google Bard and Microsoft Bing and Gen AI has proved massively disruptive, with businesses seeking to explore how they can apply the technology.

item.title: A catalogue of genetic mutations to help pinpoint the cause of diseases | DeepMind Blog
item.description: We've released a catalogue of ‚Äòmissense‚Äô mutations where researchers can learn more about what effect they may have. Missense variants are genetic mutations that can affect the function of human prote...
item.content:encoded: We've released a catalogue of ‚Äòmissense‚Äô mutations where researchers can learn more about what effect they may have. Missense variants are genetic mutations that can affect the function of human proteins. In some cases, they can lead to diseases such as cystic fibrosis, sickle-cell anaemia, or cancer. The AlphaMissense catalogue was developed using AlphaMissense, our new AI model which classifies missense variants.

As a result, there is a growing demand for lightweight, yet high-quality face generation and editing models, which are often based on ...

item.content:encoded: Posted by Gabriel Barcik and Duc-Hieu Tran, Research Engineers, Google Research In today's digital age, smartphones and desktop web browsers serve as the primary tools for accessing news and information. However, the proliferation of website clutter ‚Äî encompassing complex layouts, navigation elements, and extraneous links ‚Äî significantly impairs both the reading experience and article navigation. This issue is particularly acute for individuals with accessibility requirements. To improve ...
